select a.store_id,a.installouttype_name,a.installouttype_content, e.id as type_id,e.name as type_name,d.id as subtype_id,d.name as subtype_name,c.id as prod_id,c.name as prod_name,c.unit as prod_unit,c.style prod_style,f.name as brand_name,count(a.installoutlist_id) as installoutnum ,sum(g.value_net) value_net from (
) a inner join ems_equipment b on a.ecode=b.ecode inner join ems_equipmentprod c on b.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_equipmentsubtype d on c.subtype_id=d.id inner join ems_equipmenttype e on d.parent_id=e.id inner join ems_brand f on c.brand_id=f.id left join report_assetclean g on a.ecode=g.ecode group by a.store_id,a.installouttype_name ,a.installouttype_content, e.id,e.name ,d.id,d.name,c.id,c.name ,c.unit,c.style ,f.name order by a.installouttype_name,a.installouttype_content
